mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chatMessages (num, userId, postId, nickName, type, message, time) VALUES (#{num}, #{userId}, #{postId}, #{nickName}, #{type}, #{message}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select distinct nickName from chatMessages where postId = #{postId} and nickname != '알수없음'
mapper.update: update chatMessages set nickName ='알수없음' where postId = #{postId} and userId = #{userId}
mapper.select: select nickName,message,type,time from chatMessages where postId=#{postId} and time >= ( select time from chatMessages where userId = #{userId} and TYPE in ('MASTER', 'ENTER') and nickName != '알수없음' order by time asc limit 1) order by time asc
